sentiment_analysis.summary: The customer had a negative experience with a new ATS-CRM integration that did not meet their expectations, leading to issues with data management and duplicate records, which the customer discussed in detail with the agent.

call_resolution.problem_statement: The customer was experiencing issues with a new ATS-CRM system that they had recently implemented. The main problems were that the system was not integrating the customer, contact, and position data as expected, leading to duplicate records and a disjointed user experience.
call_resolution.resolution_details: The employee and customer discussed the issues they were facing with the new system, including the separate name, position, and company records, as well as the challenges with merging duplicate records. They acknowledged that this was a common issue with some ATS-CRM systems like Bullhorn.

follow_up.details: The employee should follow up with the customer to see if they have been able to find a workaround or solution to the data integration issues, or if they need further assistance.

missed_best_practices: Summarize the key issues and proposed solutions
Confirm customer understanding and agreement with next steps
Provide clear timeline for follow-up or resolution
Offer contact information for further assistance
improvement_suggestions: Provide a summary of the key issues and proposed solutions to ensure the customer understands the plan going forward
Confirm the customer's understanding and agreement with the next steps
Provide a clear timeline for when the employee will follow up or when the customer can expect a resolution
Offer the customer's contact information for further assistance if needed
